account.ask-have: Don't already have an account on our beautiful platform?

delete.confirm: If you want to delete your account and all data associated with it, press the button below:
delete.confirm-twice: By confirming the deletion, you will permanently and irrevocably delete your account from our database and will loose your access to our easy management interface for your domains.
delete.confirm-password: To ensure this is really you, please enter your password:
delete.consequence: Your domains owned on others platforms will not be affected by the deletion, they'll continue to respond with the current dataset.
delete.remain-data: For technical reason, your account will be deleted right after your validation, but some data from your account will persist until the next database clean up.
delete.success: Your account have been successfully deleted. We hope to see you back soon.

account.no-password-change: You are identified through an external service, if you need to change your password, change it on the dedicated interface of {{provider}}.

signup.join-call: Join our nice platform in less than 2 minutes!
signup.address-why: We'll use your address to {{identify}} you on this platform, and to contact you for {{security-operations}}.
signup.receive-update: Keep me informed of future big improvements

common.add-object: Add a {{thing}} object to this service
common.name: Name
common.survey: A remark? A comment to share? Don't hesitate to write to us!

alert.remove: This action only removes {{domain}} from your happyDomain managed domains. All history and abstracted zones will be discarded. The domain {{domain}} remains fully intact at the provider. Are you sure you want to continue?

unable-retrieve.description: Unfortunately, we were unable to retrieve information for the domain {{domain}}:
unable-retrieve.title: Unable to retrieve domain information

domains.added-success: Great! {{domain}} has been added. You can manage it right now.

done.title: Zone applied successfully!
done.description: Your zone {{zone}} have been successfully propagated!

apply.nochange: There is no changes to apply! Current zone is in sync with the server.
apply.others: {{count:eq; 0:no other change; 1:{{count}} other change; default:{{count}} others changes}}

domains.give-explicit-name: Give an explicit name in order to easily find this service.

view.description: Review the modifications that will be applied to {{domain}}
view.title: View zone

instruction.bad-link: The link you follow is invalid. Check you copy the entier link and retry.
instruction.check-inbox: Please check your inbox in order to validate your e-mail address.
instruction.new-confirmation: If you need a new confirmation e-mail, just enter your address in the form below.
instruction.validate-address: In order to validate your e-mail address, please check your inbox, and follow the link contained in the message.
instruction.validated: Your new e-mail address is now validated!

email.send-recover: Send me an e-mail to recover my account
email.recover: In order to recover your account, we'll send you an e-mail containing a link that will allow you to redefine your password

404.title: Page not found
404.content: The page you are look for was not found.

errors.account-delete: An error occurs when trying to delete your account
errors.address-valid: A valid email address is required
errors.domain-access: An error occurs when trying to access domain's list.
errors.domain-attach: An error occurs when attaching the domain to happyDomain
errors.domain-have: It appears you don't have any domain name registered on this provider.
errors.domain-import: An error occurs when trying to synchronize this domain:
errors.domain-list: This provider doesn't permit to list existing domains. Use the form below to add one.
errors.password-change: Unable to change your password account
errors.password-match: Password and its confirmation doesn't match.
errors.password-weak: Password needs to be stronger: at least 8 characters with numbers, lower case and upper case characters.
errors.provider-delete: Something went wrong during provider deletion
errors.resolve: An error occurs when trying to resolve the domain.
errors.rr-add: An error occurs when trying to add RR to the zone:
errors.rr-delete: An error occurs when trying to delete RR in the zone:

session.title: Authentication timeout
session.content: Invalid session, your have been logged out: {{err}}. Please login again.

errors.account-no-auth: You're using happyDomain without authentication. You cannot manage other account properties.
errors.domain-all-imported: This account on {{provider}} doesn't have any more domain to import.

history.see: Display the zone at this time
history.title: History of changes to the zone

logs.no-entry: No entry in the domain log.
logs.title: Domain's logs

onboarding.choose-configured: choose between already configured providers or {{action}}:
onboarding.use: Use {{happyDomain}} as a replacement interface to your usual domain name provider. It'll still rely on your provider's infrastructure, via our simple interface. As a first step, {{first-step}}

no-sale.title: I don't own any domain
no-sale.description: {{happyDomain}} does not sell domains yet. To start using our interface, you need to buy a domain from one of our supported providers.
no-sale.buy-advice: We'll provide some guidance in the near future on how to easily buy a domain name. So stay tuned and get in touch with us if you can help us build a comprehensive guide.

hosting.q: I don't want to rely on my domain name hosting provider anymore. Can I host my domain name on your infrastructure?
hosting.a: We'll provide such a feature in the near future, as it's on our manifest. We choose to focus first on spreading the word that domain names are accessibles to everyone through this sweet interface, before targeting privacy, censorship, …

secondary.q: I have my own infrastructure. Can I use {{happyDomain}} as a secondary authoritative server?
secondary.a: We'll provide such feature in a near future, as soon as our name server infrastructure is ready.

password.fill: In order to recover your account, please fill the following form, with a fresh password.
password.success: You can now login with your new password.
password.success-change: Your account's password has been changed with success.

CAA.all-issuers-body: With those parameters, all issuer can create certificate for this domain and subdomain.
CAA.all-wild-issuers-body: With those parameters, all issuer can create wildcard certificate for this domain and subdomain.
CAA.incident-response-text: How would you want to be contacted in case of violation of the current security policy?
CAA.mail-all-allowed-title: No CA constraint for S/MIME certificates issuance.
CAA.mail-all-allowed-body: All CA can emit S/MIME certificates for your domain. You should disallow or restrict to certain CA. S/MIME certificates are used for example to sign and encrypt e-mail communications. If you do not use such certificate, you should disallow their issuance.
CAA.no-issuers-body: With those parameters, no issuer is allowed to create certificate for this subdomain.
CAA.no-mail-title: No issuer authorized for S/MIME certificate.
CAA.no-mail-body: With those parameters, no issuer is authorized to create S/MIME certificate for this domain and subdomain.
CAA.no-wild-body: With those parameters, no issuer is authorized to create wildcard certificate for this domain and subdomain. But this can be override with the following settings:
CAA.title: Certificates issuance
CAA.wild-same-body: With those parameters, all issuer authorized for certificate issuance can also create wildcard certificate for this domain and subdomain.

service.new-description: Click here to add a new service to this subdomain.
service.ttl-tip: 0 means default TTL, others values are exprimed in seconds

provider.associations: {{count:eq; 0:no domain associated; 1:{{count}} domain associated; default:{{count}} domains associated}}
provider.empty: You have no provider defined currently. Try {{action}}!
provider.find: Can't find your domain provider here?
provider.select-provider: First, select the provider hosting your domain:
provider.title: Your domain providers

upgrade.title: An update is available!
upgrade.content: A new version of happyDomain is already available. To enable it, please click here to refresh the page.

wait.asking-domains: Asking provider for the existing domains...
wait.exporting: Please wait while we export your zone …
wait.formating: Please wait while we format your zone …
wait.importing: Please wait while we are importing your domain …

settings.showrrtypes: Show resource type associated with services (for users familiar with DNS)
settings.title: Settings

resolver.custom-description: Enter the addresse (a domain name or an IP) of the resolver you want to use.
resolver.domain-description: Indicate the domain you search the records. For example, you can try {{domain}}.
resolver.field-description: What kind of DNS record you want to see. For example: A is for IPv4, AAAA is for IPv6, ...
resolver.resolver-description: This is the server we will ask for the information.
resolver.showDNSSEC: Show DNSSEC records in answer (if any)
